text:
@realDonaldTrump You are letting these mere distractions keep you from doing your job: 
-Protect Americans
-Protect Black & Brown Americans from OUR OWN POLICE
-Protect Amreicans from Covid-19
-HELP us forge a more perfect Union

(You have done none of the above and made ALL of the above WORSE!)
